name: Tactical Superiority
description:
Take control of the battlefield with the brand new Advanced-Mechanical-Suit Mark 0.5 Beta. Grasp the future now! Field tested with great results! Survival guaranteed or your money back! (survival not guaranteed, refer to the warranty card for more information).


- - Controls - -


WASD / Arrow keys : Move around
Mouse : Aim
LMB / Space (hold down): Shoot plasma
RMB (click, hold, release): Target and shoot up to 4 missiles

E / Enter : Continue dialogue
ESC / F1 : Go back to menu
F4: Toggle Fullscreen


- - Developer's comments - -


Originally a Ludum Dare 33 entry.

LD33 page

Post-Mortem

And later a Ludum Dare October Challenge 2015 entry:

LD OC2015 page
